divs: Sighting DetailsI went with a friend to Sedona, Arizona for three days. That night she told me to go some places to take pictures and we went to a place called more or less, Takepalake. There are stores and restaurants, but at that time every thing was closed. She told me to sit at the border of a water fountain and I did and she took a picture, she took a few more picture and next day we went back to Vegas. When we returned to Las Vegas she sent me the picture to my computer and I found out that up in the sky behind me was something. My son zoomed the picture and we saw that it was a Hexagon. He separated the Hexagon from me to zoom it and we saw figures inside it. I will never know what it is, but it is not easy to see shapes like this in the sky, some people think it could be a hologram sent by an space ship, but as I said, I don't know what it is. For a few days I had the strange feeling that this was some kind of sign and then I dismissed it and tried to forget it. Thank you for reading. {pid}
